data.title: Coca-Cola calls for FIFA President Sepp Blatter to step down immediately.

Belfast City Council wants people who are convicted of for animal cruelty to be registered in the same way that sex offenders are.

A woman who fled to the UK from Jamaica to escape a life of sexual abuse is deported after her lawyers were unable to send any evidence to the UK Home Office; the Home Office's fax machine was broken and they refused to accept any other delivery method.
